  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 </div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="90117" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="90117" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.10</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="238">238</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="37"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>AIUla</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. <b>AIUla</b> was launched in 2024. Top notes are Frankincense, Black Pepper and Guatemalan Cardamom; middle notes are Plum, Tobacco and Saffron; base notes are Vanilla and Turmeric. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2356321" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2356321" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hologram"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2178156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2178156.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="hologram" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2356321ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2356321" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2178156">hologram</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 05:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells very strongly of cardamom with a bit of vanilla sweetness. im a bit disappointed since this doesnt reflect arabian scents as i would have expected. it went in the right direction, but it feels like an unfinished painting. adding some coffee would have made this smell like arabian coffee, and it would have been perfect.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2343974" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brutus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brutus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2343974ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2343974" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1640834">Brutus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-10">11/10/24 02:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Huuh, <br />
I bought this sample because i like plum and tobacco.<br />
I feel no plum and no tobacco....<br />
The opening is all about the same disgusting saffron as in BR 540 and Widian Liwa.<br />
And the drydown smells just like some classic "old man perfume"<br />
I don't like this at all..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2343974"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2343974#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its gorgeous, but as so many others have said, I just wish it was stronger !</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2270902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2270902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255195" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255195" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rikeo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777944"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1777944.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rikeo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Contradictions-in-ILK/Sincere-61379.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61379.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sincere"title="Sincere"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255195ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255195" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1777944">rikeo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 08:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I recently picked this up at the airport and one first sniff I loved that it was warm, inviting and very Middle Eastern. <br />
<br />
Spraying it again today, I could see why one may not like this and immediately I started to regret my purchase. However, like I have to do with most fragrances, I started creating some layering combos to see where I could take this pretty scent. After pairing with Sweet Vanilla by Montale and another combination with Burberry Goddess and Sultan Al Oud by Al Rehab, my love for AlUla has reignited.<br />
<br />
I am someone who attributes colour to things and this event is gold, with reds and oranges - very very warm and rich.<br />
<br />
Not a safe blind buy I would say.<br />
Im glad I held onto this and decided to experiment further.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2255195"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2255195#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2245139" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2245139" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mademoiselle R&ecirc;ve"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1717004"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1717004.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mademoiselle R&ecirc;ve" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-55997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Mon Guerlain Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2245139ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2245139" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1717004">Mademoiselle R&ecirc;ve</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 14:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Main problem is, it is not well blended - I like many of the notes, and yet something "itches" here, especially in the opening. A bomb of spices, but with a feeling of disharmony. More suited for men.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2245139"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2245139#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2187301" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2187301" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cosmotron"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242227"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cosmotron" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2187301ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2187301" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242227">Cosmotron</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-13">06/13/24 14:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really beautiful sent, reminds me of a gentler and rounder version of Costum National's Soul.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2187301"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2187301#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2181126" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2181126" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RGH01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1331188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RGH01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Francesca-Bianchi/The-Dark-Side-40884.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40884.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Dark Side"title="The Dark Side"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2181126ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2181126" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1331188">RGH01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-07">06/07/24 10:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>AlUla is the newest release from Penhaligons, and unfortunately yet another disappointment for me. When I got my sample in and saw the note breakdown I was excited, Im a sucker for a good plum fragrance, unfortunately this is not. It doesnt smell bad, it simply doesnt excite or wow me.<br />
<br />
This scent tries to make the plum (prunol I imagine) the star of the show, but inadvertently overdoes it to the point where it becomes a bit too sweet, too cloying and somewhat synthetic. The then dry, spicy and scratchy combination of black pepper, tobacco, frankincense and cardamom is just too much - its not a good mix.<br />
<br />
Overall its pleasant, I dont hold any profound dislike towards it, its just simply not for me. Im sure there will be those that love this as it seems easy to wear, but there are much better plum fragrances out there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2181126"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2181126#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2180140" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2180140" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BMulroney"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137435"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2137435.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BMulroney" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floris/No-89-5550.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5550.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="No 89"title="No 89"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2180140ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2180140" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137435">BMulroney</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-06">06/06/24 11:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Whilst this is a pleasant perfume, it is deeply underwhelming especially coming from Penhaligon's trade routes collection where I am expecting big, bold, spicy notes with real punch and projection.  Although subtlety and finesse definitely have their place, in Alula this is misjudged, in my opinion.<br />
<br />
The dry, spicy opening is beautiful, albeit far too subdued.  As the scent begins to dry down I am left wondering where it has gone.  There is a little sweetness of plum with the earthy, dry, richness of tobacco but I feel like I a working quite hard to find it.  In musical terms, the chords and notes are a wonderful harmonious blend, but I wish I could crank up the volume on this one.<br />
<br />
After the incredible, intoxifying and all-engulfing experience of Halfeti I was, perhaps wrongly, expecting a different but the same intensity.<br />
<br />
This is not one that will make it from the sample to the full bottle for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2180140"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2180140#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179069" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2179069" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blueberries"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blueberries" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabe-Masson/Macadam-Paz-39977.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39977.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Macadam Paz"title="Macadam Paz"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2179069ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2179069" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580193">Blueberries</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 12:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very comforting. You can feel the spicy, dry incense in the back of the throat and sweet, dried plum complements the amber bitterness. Cardamom adds spice and the saffron is warm and realistic. I also get a soapy osmanthus. An aromatic aspect from light vetiver and a hint of earthy patchouli balance the smoky vanilla. <br />
<br />
Yes, this can be nice for summer eves too - when in mood for warmth with warmth as there is the fresh spicy/aromatic touch, I prefer it for cooler months tho.<br />
Moderate sillage, strong longevity, a little goes a long way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2179069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2179069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178476" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178476" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iadoreyourdior"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346208"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="iadoreyourdior" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178476ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178476" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1346208">iadoreyourdior</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 03:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I found it quite animalic and dry. I was quite sure that I would find out oud in it, but it has none apparently. Plus, the sweetness comes from plum, which feels like this is a rose-oud composition.<br />
<br />
I tried this one on paper, so my impressions may be corrupted. I would definitely visit it later.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2178476"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2178476#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176757" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2176757" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chancellor7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379046"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="chancellor7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2176757ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2176757" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379046">chancellor7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-03">06/03/24 11:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not bad when you give it a chance. Same DNA as Diptyque Volutes when the smoke clears. A bit sweeter and longer lasting though. Better yet, It is an animalic, woody incense version of Emporio Armani Diamonds mixed with Diptyque Volutes. Strange example I know, but its true to my nose. Trust me. It matches a very mysterious, confident and well established woman. Or a sexy charming man who smokes cigars and drinks sweet brown liquor at 12pm lunch meetings in dimly lit restaurants. Wellthe opening scent is definitely very medicinal, old fashioned Middle Eastern fragrance, almost like how a Dubai souks products &amp; fabrics would smell like after years of incense smoke (bakhoor) and other fragrances filling every fibre. Like the inside of a rich Egyptian tradesmans jaguar or Mercedes Benz in the 90s. <br />
<br />
Now now now, when it drys down, Im loving the mysteriously subtle energy it gives off. Its quietly powerful, very crushed up, it doesnt have a loud sillage. Almost like if it were a moisturiser. Theres a plummy sweetness coming from the vanilla &amp; plum. Theres a powdery, dusty smell like your mothers old foundations and lipsticks (in a good way). Theres a woody, smoky almost damp scent that is tolerable and not overdone, mixed with a lil incense and medicinal. The dry down is the part that reminds me of Armani Diamonds and I really think layering the two would bring the best out of this understated fragrance. I think layering Diamonds would make it a little more loveable for everyone.<br />
<br />
The vanilla smoky spiciness is identical to Diptyque Volutes, but it gives off less old-lady smell than Volutes. Al Ullas vanilla is more prominent, much like Diptyque Eau Duelle.<br />
<br />
I still have the package wrapping paper and the scent still fills the room on the paper. Not sure how far it projects and lasts when others smell you, but it cant be missed.<br />
<br />
Lucky 7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2176757"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2176757#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2174685" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2174685" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kpop_stan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543675"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1543675.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kpop_stan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2174685ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2174685" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543675">kpop_stan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-01">06/01/24 11:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow, I didn't think I'd like this at all - turmeric, pepper AND cardamom? No thank you! Except I was offered a free sample and I mean hell, why not?<br />
<br />
Thank goodness I took Penhaligon's up on their offer! What a gorgeous, gorgeous perfume. For starters the frankincense in here has the same gorgeous "fizzy" quality to it that is also present in Lush Calacas, Boss Bottled Elixir and Infusion d'Iris Cedre (the Prada one lists benzoin rather than frankincense but hey), and I'm reminded of Burberry Goddess ever so slightly due to the vanilla + spice combo, though the spices both there and here are only present to subtly enhance the other ingredients rather than being in your face. The reason I say "ever so slightly" is because of the inclusion of saffron and plum, both of which are very prominent. <br />
<br />
Despite all this I agree with others - this is a surprisingly subdued perfume. I'm impressed with how Penhaligon's took a scent profile that is usually heavy and dense and made a lighter, intimate version of it. And it lasts for hours too! AlUla feels like the perfect compromise for people who can be quite sensitive to perfumes, but are also sick and tired of having to stick to light florals and musks. I miiiiiiiiight buy a 30ml of this, but darn it I wish they didn't gatekeep the 10mls so much! I'd have bought a travel size in a heartbeat (no, Penhaligon's, a 30ml is NOT a travel size.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2174685"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2174685#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2168134" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2168134" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Peffrey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202177"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1202177.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Peffrey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/Levar-del-Sole-93107.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93107.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Levar del Sole"title="Levar del Sole"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2168134ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2168134" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202177">Peffrey</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 03:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Dry &amp; spicy scent. Opens up in a cloud of pepper and incense and then develop into a faint syrupy plum.<br />
<br />
Not your typical oriental scent, great choice if you want something sweet and oriental during hot summerdays.<br />
<br />
Update: Second time wearing the perfume.<br />
After 4 hours drydown, a bitter frankincense appears.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2168134"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2168134#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2162196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2162196" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MrAbbas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096131"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1096131.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MrAbbas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2162196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2162196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096131">MrAbbas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-20">05/20/24 12:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not my cup of tea. Very spicy and animalic with not very nice dry down. Penhalighon has better offerings.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2162196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2162196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2156046" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2156046" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CynicalPink"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924789"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1924789.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CynicalPink" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Commodity/Book-50618.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50618.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Book"title="Book"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2156046ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2156046" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924789">CynicalPink</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-14">05/14/24 16:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spicy, sweet plum that reminds me strongly of one of ELDOs offerings, but I cant recall which for certain (possibly Frustration). <br />
<br />
Became barely a skin scent in less than two hours. Between that and its similarity to less expensive scents, Id rather spend my money on a different fragrance from this house (Luna was a recent one I enjoyed).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2156046"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2156046#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2140681" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2140681" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rosequeen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169399"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1169399.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rosequeen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Raphael/Replique-5132.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5132.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Replique"title="Replique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2140681ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2140681" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169399">rosequeen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-29">04/29/24 22:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Timid. Soft.  Someone at Penhaligon's must keep getting complaints that all their "silk road" Trade Routes stuff is too brash and gaudy, so they brought out this stuff.  It's safe and muted and acceptable.  At least that's what I'm getting after several squirts out of this little (packaged by Penhaligon's) sample.  Maybe a huge gush from a big bottle on the sales counter would produce a better ambiance. As it stands right now, no way would I drop $275 or whatever upwards from that they're pricing this.<br />
<br />
And I like this series from Penhaligon's too.  I bought the full bottles of Babylon and Constantinople, and the 10ml of Cairo.  I think Cairo is the best of them.  My Petra sample wasn't bad, but I'm still smarting at full retail.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2140681"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2140681#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2136801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2136801" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Maliken"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1598503.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Maliken" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Royal-Oud-12317.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12317.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Royal Oud"title="Royal Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2136801ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2136801" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598503">Maliken</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-26">04/26/24 03:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am mostly picking up on the black pepper and cardamom, sweet saffron and the fruitiness of the plum with hints of tobacco every now and then. I also get the vanilla and turmeric but these notes stick a bit closer to the skin where the aforementioned accords project quite nicely from about an arm's length. I would agree that this is one of Penhaligons better releases in recent years along with The Omniscient Mr. Thompson in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2136801"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2136801#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2130886" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/130399">ward.w.3ood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-20">04/20/24 16:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing new<br />
 just a beautiful name, the city of Al-Ula in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia<br />
  I hoped it would be more beautiful than that :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2130886"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2130886#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128826" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128826" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amanda0727"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583049"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="amanda0727" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Guidance-78656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guidance"title="Guidance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128826ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128826" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583049">amanda0727</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 15:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very glad I didn't blind buy. It smells very old school middle eastern to me. And the plum is not tart and juicy at all. Am I smelling the same scent as the other reviewers here?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2128826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2128826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2127383" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2127383" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amnebe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1645213.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amnebe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floral-Street/Wild-Vanilla-Orchid-47212.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47212.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wild Vanilla Orchid"title="Wild Vanilla Orchid"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2127383ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2127383" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645213">amnebe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-17">04/17/24 08:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a unique and gorgeous fragrance. It keeps morphing into something new every time you sniff. It starts out with a plum/cherry note and light citrus with spices you'd smell in Christmas desserts  mainly cardamom. The plum/cherry, cardamom, and saffron scent is always there, but sometimes the tobacco comes to the forefront. I could swear that I smelled cedar for a moment at the beginning. Then, it was heavy on the vanilla and saffron. Even though I normally think of spicy fragrances as being most appropriate for cold weather, the sweet fruity notes in this one make it medium-weight rather than heavy. So, it was fine wearing it in 90-F-degree weatther today. The fruity note reminds me a lot of the cherry scent in YSL's Black Opium Over Red. I tried making a sauce from cherries, cardamom, and safron, and the scent it gave off was fairly close to the way this fragrance smells. I'm kind of obsessed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2127383"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2127383#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118297" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118297" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="brainrot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1394823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1394823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="brainrot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118297ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118297" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1394823">brainrot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-08">04/08/24 11:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gorgeous, gorgeous scent. Opens up with a sharp note, cutting through the spiciness, developing on the skin into a mouthwatering, juicy plum. Sweet, juicy and captivating - in my opinion, this was made to perform in the warmth of summer!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2118297"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2118297#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2112679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2112679" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ReinaValkyrie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2082668"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2082668.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ReinaValkyrie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2112679ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2112679" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); After getting through my sample I've had to treat myself to a full bottle. Another beautiful creation from Penhaligon's.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2112679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2112679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2102885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2102885" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfumato"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/293134"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.293134.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfumato" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2102885ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2102885" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); <br />
A detectable note of frankincense with a balmy ambery back ground and touch of dark fruits.<br />
<br />
Nice scent but overlaps with so many perfumes out there.<br />
<br />
Cheers</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2102885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2102885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2101079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2099998" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nuver"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676790"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1676790.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nuver" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2099998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2099998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676790">nuver</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-21">03/21/24 16:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such a beautiful smell</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2099998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2099998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2096263" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2096263" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent.guide"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406103.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent.guide" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2096263ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2096263" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103">Scent.guide</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-18">03/18/24 10:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet dried fruits with cold (almost metallic) opening. I guess these are spices (especially saffron) and olibanum that give that kind of effect. To be honest, it smells a bit imbalanced, because it has some earthy (almost dusty) note that doesnt go well with the whole composition (might be turmeric??). Sooo its okay, but not groundbreaking for sure.<br />
<br />
Follow me on IG: scent.guide</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2096263"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2096263#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2093351" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2093351" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cpsottak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460598"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1460598.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="cpsottak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/SpongeBob-Squarepants/SpongeBob-28286.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28286.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="SpongeBob"title="SpongeBob"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2093351ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2093351" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1460598">cpsottak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-15">03/15/24 08:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Thank you Penhaligons for offering free samples on your website, i only had to pay shipping! <br />
This fragrance smells great, Penhaligons is my favorite house. I dont care if people say their fragrances smell like another/uninspired or if they smell designer.<br />
What Penhaligons is doing is releasing amazing, likeable, unique fragrances, that smell refined, quality, upscale! And this is another release that is all of those things.<br />
The opening has such a juicy plum, with such an aromatic depth, and the right amount of sweetness that is really unique to my nose.<br />
This to me is right down the middle unisex, however as a man i think on my skin the spice quality comes through enough to lean it masculine. I love the trade routes collection, and this one seems like a good choice for a signature scent to someone that like the sweet and spicy profile, you will definitely stand out from the crowd.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="90117"comment_id="2093351"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/AIUla-90117.html?ccid=2093351#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2092680" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
